name: Coin Dice
description:
A Game created for the Game Jam GMTK 2022.

The Objective is to collect coins within time limit of 1 minute. The dice roll determines the number of bricks that can be deployed.^

First click the space bar to get a dice roll. You are then alowed to deploy that many bricks for you to get on until you capture all 9 coins.

Controls:

a to move left

d to move right

w to jump

space to roll dice

x to deploy brick

click to zoom in and out
